query: (Background: "prostate cancer"^4 OR "Prostate carcinoma" OR "Acinar adenocarcinoma" OR "Ductal adenocarcinoma" OR "Transitional cell cancer" OR "urothelial cancer" OR "Squamous cell cancer" OR "Small cell prostate cancer" OR Doc_title: "prostate cancer"^4 OR "Prostate carcinoma" OR "Acinar adenocarcinoma" OR "Ductal adenocarcinoma" OR "Transitional cell cancer" OR "urothelial cancer" OR "Squamous cell cancer" OR "Small cell prostate cancer") AND (Background: PTEN^4 OR "BZS" OR "DEC" OR "CWS1" OR "GLM2" OR "MHAM" OR "TEP1" OR "MMAC1" OR "PTEN1" OR "10q23del" OR "PTENbeta" OR Doc_title: PTEN^4 OR "BZS" OR "DEC" OR "CWS1" OR "GLM2" OR "MHAM" OR "TEP1" OR "MMAC1" OR "PTEN1" OR "10q23del" OR "PTENbeta")
